translations: v．开玩笑，戏谑：以幽默的方式逗乐或戏弄某人。
· He was just joshing when he said he didn't like the movie.
他说他不喜欢这部电影只是在开玩笑。

phrs.translation: 他在他的博客乔希论坛

sentences.sentence: That said, he was just "joshing" - and, for the record, he had the flu when he wrote that column.
sentences.translation: 这就是说，他只是开“玩笑”——而且，根据记录，他写这篇专栏时，刚好得了流感。
